verses.roman:
'ṣāṭhīra mātā' nāma, bhaṭṭācāryera gṛhiṇī
prabhura mahā-bhakta teṅho, snehete jananī

synonyms: ṣāṭhīra mātā—the mother of Ṣāṭhī; nāma—named; bhaṭṭācāryera gṛhiṇī—the wife of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mahā-bhakta—a great devotee; teṅho—she; snehete—in affection; jananī—just like a mother.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya's wife was known as the mother of Ṣāṭhī. She was a great devotee of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and she was affectionate like a mother.
